lead_paragraph: CASE--Dr. Robert B.,age 96, of NYC, Southampton and Naples, beloved husband of Dr. Nan Case and stepfather of Miles Robert and family, passed away peacefully in Southampton Hospital of natural causes. Dr. Case graduated from MIT, Columbia University College of Physicians & Surgeons and was on the staff of NIH and Harvard School of Public Health. He spent the majority of his career as Director of the Laboratory of Experimental Cardiology at St. Luke's Hospital and published numerous articles in peer reviewed journals. He was also an active member of the Multi-Center Cardiology Research Group and retired as Professor Emeritus of Columbia University. He was truly a brilliant scientist, a loving man and greatly respected. In lieu of flowers, please remember him with an act of kindness. The graveside service will be held at the Southampton Cemetery on Wednesday at noon. 1/3
